dtliExcerpt: The show feels more like a lecture than a play, with the two actors reciting stats and career highlights while occasionally picking up basketballs.
bwwExcerpt: The only time the 90-minute show’s pace falters is during the overlong scene when Bird’s mom, Georgia (Deirdre O’Connell, stellar in several supporting roles), invites Magic for lunch in her Indiana home. [...] Yep, as far as bioplays go, this one’s got bounce.
